column4: well i had some specific questions which i couldnt find on the internet, i need to know how to get into the bios so i can change the boot order to disk drive first
when you boot, probably delete key or maybe f2 key. Depends on the bios. First screen should say
try hitting f2, f8, delete keys madly during bootup
only using your bios. see what rweait1 said above if all else fails
